item.title: CVE-2017-15107|2024-08-05T19:50:16.035Z -- simon%20kelley -- dnsmasq
item.description: A vulnerability was found in the implementation of DNSSEC in Dnsmasq up to and including 2.78. Wildcard synthesized NSEC records could be improperly interpreted to prove the non-existence of hostnames that actually exist.
